about.hero_desc: Learn about the history, values and team behind ValdryaINC. Discover what makes us different and why we are the ideal choice for your digital project.
about.history_desc1: ValdryaINC was born in 2015 with the vision of transforming ideas into exceptional digital experiences. From our humble beginnings as a small team of passionate developers, we have grown to become a leading digital agency, working with clients from various sectors and sizes.
about.history_desc2: Our journey began when we identified a gap in the market: many companies needed quality digital solutions but lacked access to technical and strategic expertise. We decided to close that gap by offering comprehensive services that combine creativity, technology and strategy.
about.values_subtitle: The principles that guide our work
about.value1_desc: We constantly seek new ways to solve problems and improve solutions.
about.value2_desc: We maintain clear and honest communication in all our projects.
about.value3_desc: We are committed to delivering exceptional work on every project.
about.value4_desc: We work together with our clients as strategic partners.
about.cta_desc: Join our list of satisfied clients and let's start transforming your idea into reality.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Answers to the most common questions
faq.q1: What is the process to start a project?
faq.a1: Our process begins with an initial consultation where we discuss your needs and objectives. Then, we conduct an analysis and present you with a detailed proposal with timeline and budget. Once approved, we form the team and begin development with regular meetings to keep you informed.
faq.q2: What development methodologies do you use?
faq.a2: We mainly work with agile methodologies (Scrum and Kanban) that allow us to adapt to changes and deliver value incrementally. This ensures transparency, flexibility and the delivery of a product that truly fits your needs.
faq.q3: Do you offer maintenance after launch?
faq.a3: Yes, we offer various maintenance and post-launch support plans that include updates, monitoring, backups and incident resolution. We can customize a plan according to the specific needs of your project.
faq.q4: Do you work with international companies?
faq.a4: Absolutely. We have experience working with clients from different countries and are equipped to handle projects remotely with virtual meetings, collaboration tools and communication in multiple languages.
